main event: Captain, USAF, observed an unidentified aerial object resembling an automobile headlight in Wiesbaden, Germany.
interesting points: The object was seen at an altitude of 12,000 to 15,000 feet before it accelerated and leveled off at 6,000 feet., The sighting lasted for about 4 minutes., Two control tower operators on duty reported not witnessing any means of propulsion., The object had a circular shape and a slight oscillation., The report was declassified after 12 years.
sighted object: circular object resembling an auto headlight
